ygData.subject: Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Whee, a reason to use it instead of ER. ... *blink* *rubs eyes* *blink* You re not making this up, are you? ... Heh.  A friend of mine fell to his death
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Feb 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
> *Songs*
>
> - Syvelian's Anti-magic Aura: Potency increased.

Whee, a reason to use it instead of ER.

> - Shauri's Sonorous Clouding: Now also grants See Invisible. Party members
> can now see each other while under the effect of this song.

*blink*

*rubs eyes*

*blink*

You're not making this up, are you?

> Additionally, the following songs have been given a slightly larger radius:
> - Selo's Accelerando
> - Agilmente's Aria of Eagles

Heh. A friend of mine fell to his death when I tried to use
this song to get us down from the top of the Highpass ramp in
EK. He ran out of range before I could type "come back."

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
